entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 a.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023
